page.title: 05MOSS VALLEY(II)
page.content: {ECOLOGY} With the reclaiming of the valley the ecology enviroment has changed drama_ tically over the last decade.Before any work was done the area was very barren indeed,except for the decid_ uous woodland which had managed to survive the industrial era very few other plants had survived.This was due mainly to the vast quantities of unfe_ rtile mine waste which covered the area.The most common plants at this time were of course{nettles,briers}and the{rosebay willowherb.}Now as part of the reclaiming there has been an int_ ensive planting programme introducing a variety of native wild flowers and shrubs.The ponds created have also been stocked with native plant and animal life.
